name: Apropolis
description:
This is my first platform game, and is based on a surreal experience I had last year where I was stung by a bee in the middle of the forehead whilst drawing avocados on a farm. That night I met an acupuncturist that uses bee stings (instead of needles) and he said bees unblock shakras. I broke Flatgame jam's rules a little as there are two scenes.

Music by Treble / Monkeeastronaut under an Attribution-Non Commercial-Share Alike License.
